CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In contrast , the PCE suddenly decreased in the blended device of P5 and PC61BM ( 3.02% ) and further decreased in P6 ( 2.09% ) , mainly due to the significant decrease of the J SC .

Let's think step by step.

The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. P5
2. PC61BM
3. P6
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies. Here are the updated "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PC61BM
2. P6

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PC61BM |
| P6 |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In contrast , the PCE suddenly decreased in the blended device of P5 and PC61BM ( 3.02% ) and further decreased in P6 ( 2.09% ) , mainly due to the significant decrease of the J SC .

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PCE (Photocurrent Efficiency)
2. J SC (Short-Circuit Current)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. PCE (Photocurrent Efficiency)
2. PC61BM (a type of material)

The entity "J SC" (Short-Circuit Current) is not a material property, so it has been removed.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid entities in the "Property Name" column:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE |
| PC61BM |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In contrast , the PCE suddenly decreased in the blended device of P5 and PC61BM ( 3.02% ) and further decreased in P6 ( 2.09% ) , mainly due to the significant decrease of the J SC .

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. 3.02%
2. 2.09%
3. J SC

Explanation:

1. 3.02% and 2.09% are the values of the PCE (Photocurrent Efficiency) of the blended device of P5 and PC61BM, and P6, respectively.
2. J SC (Short-Circuit Current) is a property value that is mentioned to have significantly decreased in the blended device of P5 and PC61BM, leading to a decrease in PCE.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of a material property:

1. 3.02%
2. 2.09%

These are the values of the PCE (Photocurrent Efficiency) of the blended device of P5 and PC61BM, and P6, respectively. They are the material properties that are being discussed in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid entities presented as a Property Value column:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 3.02% |
| 2.09% |

These are the values of the PCE (Photocurrent Efficiency) of the blended device of P5 and PC61BM, and P6, respectively.
